name: Tomb of the Tyrant
description:
UPDATE:  Players should be able to save and utilize the options menu so long as they don't delete the www and save folders in the .zip. Also included an option to view the answer to the church puzzle. Check the bookcase on the first floor of the church to see it.

Tomb of the Tyrant (TotT) is a short standalone adventure featuring the exploits of the ambiguously heroic Captain Raum and his long-suffering crewmembers, Mary and Akram. 

Lead their party through the abandoned Republic of Grell, an isolated community whose  inhabitants have all mysteriously vanished. Piece together the mystery of their disappearance from notes and journals left by the citizens, and take on the monsters that have moved into Grell with a brutal, strategic turn-based battle system featuring deep character customization!

Riches and havok await!

  • Customize characters to take on different roles through stances, equipment  and weapon types, all of which enable unique skills!
  • Fight through mobs of zombies, demon, skeledogs, thinkin' slimes and more in a wave-based combat system!
  • Name your dog!

[Please note: This is only a SHORT DEMO, not a full game]
